Package com.hissain.jscipy.signal.filter

Class FIR

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hissain.jscipy.signal.filter.FIR
  • public class FIR
extends java.lang.Object
    Finite Impulse Response (FIR) filter design methods. Matches scipy.signal.firwin

    • Method Detail

      • firwin

        public static double[] firwin​(int numtaps,
                              double[] cutoff,
                              double fs,
                              boolean pass_zero)
        Design an FIR filter using the window method. Default window is "hamming".
        Parameters:
        numtaps - The number of taps.
        cutoff - Cutoff frequency (Hz). Scalar or array.
        fs - Sampling frequency (Hz).
        pass_zero - If true, the zero frequency is passed (Lowpass, Bandstop). If false, the zero frequency is stopped (Highpass, Bandpass).
        Returns:
        Filter coefficients.

      • firwin_lowpass

        public static double[] firwin_lowpass​(int numtaps,
                                      double cutoff,
                                      double fs)
        Design a Lowpass FIR filter.
        Parameters:
        numtaps - The number of taps.
        cutoff - Cutoff frequency (Hz).
        fs - Sampling frequency (Hz).
        Returns:
        Filter coefficients.

      • firwin_highpass

        public static double[] firwin_highpass​(int numtaps,
                                       double cutoff,
                                       double fs)
        Design a Highpass FIR filter. (Requires odd number of taps for strict highpass usually, but window method handles evens with bad response at Pi).
        Parameters:
        numtaps - The number of taps.
        cutoff - Cutoff frequency (Hz).
        fs - Sampling frequency (Hz).
        Returns:
        Filter coefficients.

      • firwin_bandpass

        public static double[] firwin_bandpass​(int numtaps,
                                       double low,
                                       double high,
                                       double fs)
        Design a Bandpass FIR filter.
        Parameters:
        numtaps - The number of taps.
        low - Lower cutoff frequency (Hz).
        high - Upper cutoff frequency (Hz).
        fs - Sampling frequency (Hz).
        Returns:
        Filter coefficients.

      • firwin_bandstop

        public static double[] firwin_bandstop​(int numtaps,
                                       double low,
                                       double high,
                                       double fs)
        Design a Bandstop FIR filter.
        Parameters:
        numtaps - The number of taps.
        low - Lower cutoff frequency (Hz).
        high - Upper cutoff frequency (Hz).
        fs - Sampling frequency (Hz).
        Returns:
        Filter coefficients.
